company_overview.mission_statement: ShareID enables real-time, privacy-first identity verification without storing personal or biometric data, redefining digital trust.
key_milestones: Secured 4M in Series A funding (Source: Crunchbase)
Joined Google for Startups Accelerator (Date Not Found)
company_overview.current_status: Series A stage, fully launched product, actively participating in the Google for Startups Accelerator program focusing on AI-driven fraud detection and real-time identity verification.
company_overview.unique_value_proposition: ShareID offers a privacy-first, multi-factor authentication solution tied to government-issued IDs. It allows for seamless and secure identity verification through a simple smile, without storing sensitive biometric data. The company aims to improve the balance between user experience, security, and compliance in online identity verification.
